description: An illustration of a pogo stick in midair; the handle bars, footrests, and main body of the pole are various shades of green with some parts of the pole that are shades of deep blue. Below the pogo stick, a long thin dark blue triangle represents the pogo stick's shadow while two triangles extending upwards from the darker triangle represent the motion lines of the pogo stick's bounce. The illustration is made out of a series of triangles of various sizes.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
